question: Djibouti, to which India has provided 50 Metric Tons of food aid, is located in which continent?
explanation:
India has provided 50 Metric Tons of food aid to the African country Djibouti. This is a part of Indiaâ€™s assistance to friendly countries to during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Djibouti is located on the northeast coast of the Horn of Africa. This humanitarian assistance and disaster relief to Djibouti has been delivered by INS Airavat.
